title: Why is Urgot Pick/Ban in lck now? what the fuck happened to him?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q9ZY_KozU3U

I don't get it
He legit didn't get buffed
he got 0 indirect buff

so why are pros now:
banning him
or 1st picking him

replies.body:
I forgot to add, hes extremely hard to gank, and his farming is INSANE when done well.  PLUS EXECUTE

And he has literally no viable counter pick, whatsoever.

A great pick for high elo play
*And he has literally no viable counter pick, whatsoever.* uh..{{champion:164}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:240}}
a good urgot can whoop sion's ass tbqh. I agree with the other 3 tho

Idk about that one. Urgot doesn't have much to say about a landed Roar -> Decimate. Good Sions will space it out to where Urgot can't just flip him during his Q.

Also, Urgot guzzles mana *way* faster than Sion, who can essentially spam E and Q haphazardly.

Additionally, should Urgot ever kill Sion using his E and Q, he has no way of avoiding a good 300+ damage from Sion's passive.

What's good here though is that Urgot scales immensely with level vs high health immobile melee targets. Gaining tons of max health damage from his passive and having access to a 25% health true damage execute. Black Cleaver helps too. But Urgot's power vs Sion comes after the laning phase, not during it.
You're high af if you think those are counters. Especially kled lol no way in hell a kled wins even a decent urgot.

> [{quoted}](name=EloElXDee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=000300010003,timestamp=2018-12-02T21:16:12.599+0000)
>
> You're high af if you think those are counters. Especially kled lol no way in hell a kled wins even a decent urgot.

Kled loses lane to a lot of champs but Urgot is a lane where Kled comes back fairly easy. And this thread is 3 months old, a lot of changes have happened since then.
{{champion:106}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:24}} Are all pretty damn strong against him if they know what they are doing and what they are up against.
Yeah Panth is def strong against him. Idk bout the rest, Jax seems like it would favor urgot a lot in the early-mid.
Panth would be oom before he made a dent.

> [{quoted}](name=VermillionWolf,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2018-09-08T15:32:17.645+0000)
>
> {{champion:122}}

I've played against Darius a few times as Urgot, and what I find is Urgot wins very early on, but if Darius doesn't feed he wins the lane a little later on. Save Darius pull for when Urgot pops W, and it stops him from shooting for like 2.5 seconds. End of the day the Darius player will need to be half decent at dodging skill shots.

> [{quoted}](name=Professor Ward,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-08T13:08:31.512+0000)
>
> I forgot to add, hes extremely hard to gank, and his farming is INSANE when done well.  PLUS EXECUTE
> 
> And he has literally no viable counter pick, whatsoever.
> 
> A great pick for high elo play

As someone who has played hundreds of games of Urgot, that is not true. He has many counters, those counters just aren't very good right now.
So what you said is nonsense then? It's just a hypothetical counter.

> [{quoted}](name=Professor Ward,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-08T13:08:31.512+0000)
>
> I forgot to add, hes extremely hard to gank, and his farming is INSANE when done well.  PLUS EXECUTE
> 
> And he has literally no viable counter pick, whatsoever.
> 
> **A great pick for high elo play**

He was literally nothing in LCS & League Academy Summer. I know Urgot can be strong, but your statement isn't helping the fact that he was non-existent in the previous competitive scenes.
Do remember that other things being nerfed also increases other champions power. Someone got nerfed that has now made urgot good.

> [{quoted}](name=GladiatorOrphans,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-09-08T14:07:53.351+0000)
>
> Do remember that other things being nerfed also increases other champions power. Someone got nerfed that has now made urgot good.

Blame riot for nerfing the hell out of {{champion:83}} cause people in low elo can't handle him, and now i will get payed when urgot get nerfed cause at first i was main {{champion:62}} before the release of the dumb item called {{item:3095}} then the cycle of banned/pick started so i switched to urgot as he was my secondry pick and now here i'm with the same stupid cycle.
Yorick was never really a threat to urgot doe

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T03:10:06.612+0000)
>
> Yorick was never really a threat to urgot doe

Wrong, before the sudden nerfs to yorick, for months yorick one of the top 3 that counter urgot.
Cause he can play safe and out scale him plus wall is just a big blocker for urgot E and W.
Must be a high elo thing XD

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T06:20:13.132+0000)
>
> Must be a high elo thing XD

Well op.gg shownthe results of diamond and above right? 
So yes
He just picked in Lcs cause you canwin or lose after lane end that doesn't apply to solo queue cause people mess up and goes for mid game where he isn't that great cause cc and teamfights
max w and you get probably the best damage-sustain ratio in the game right now when played right.
I thought that Urgot maxed Q?

> [{quoted}](name=D357R0Y3R,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-09-08T12:52:51.327+0000)
>
> I thought that Urgot maxed Q?

Damage > Utility/Healing > CC. This is the usual order for maxing abilities on any champion. You prioritize CC last because it is CC. It will be good at any level. You prioritize damage because base damages hurt more when you actually put levels into it. Urgot's Q will still slow at level 1. His W will do piss damage at level 1

Except Urgot's Q actually is most of his damage output early on.

The scaling on his W ensures that it does piss damage at all phases of the game regardless of if you max it. The value of the ability is the dmg shield and the utility of triggering echoing flames rapidly.

If you max Q, it means you can Q caster minions and then finish them with one auto (or a well aimed echoing flames). Which is waveclear, which is extremely important to solo lane champions. It's also decent poke.

Which btw, if you watched OP's video (or just skimmed through it) you'd notice that every single urgot max'd Q first, then W, then E (and obviously taking their ults when needed).

This thread is just a bunch of people who don't know what they are talking about fumbling to try and sound smart.

"Oh didnt you know?! Highest mobility in game, _literally_ no counters, ranged cho gath ult, high sustain. I knew he was OP I'm surprised the koreans didnt pick him up sooner."

> [{quoted}](name=IAintDarius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-09-08T22:14:45.802+0000)
>
> This thread is just a bunch of people who don't know what they are talking about fumbling to try and sound smart.
> 
> "Oh didnt you know?! Highest mobility in game, _literally_ no counters, ranged cho gath ult, high sustain. I knew he was OP I'm surprised the koreans didnt pick him up sooner."

Saying he got more mobility than garen, voli, shvy etc made laugh the most xD
RIP Urgot he's gonna get LCS'd

As LS would say about several other champions,"he was under researched".

Most teams find it safer to pick optimal champions that they already know. It isn't optimal usage of their time to practice an underplayed champion who might turn out to be garbage when they could be using that time to be better with what they already know is good.

Time is a valuable commodity when the stakes are high and there is only so much time to practice.
Not necessarily, I suspect in high level teams they have challenger players that test various strategies and champs for the team and pro players, and then report back to them how they work out.
Because he's not bad and he wasn't bad? People just didn't think about him
It's called skill and not being a meta slave, why you think that Koreans are doing shit while people complain in the forums?

he's not even doing that well lmao

just showing up because he's a tank with some damage and decent utility who works well in mid.

favorable meta nothing else

Be reminded that Galio was open in the 1st match against a Viktor, and they chose Urgot over him. There's something odd going around about that, considering the fact that Galio provides much more team-wise than Urgot.
Viktors laning phase is pretty garbage so anything can be taken into him.
that doesn't help that galio should be better than urgot
galio doesn't shit on tanks like urgot does

So where's Zed? Maybe Lissandra? Why not Annie then?

Why even Urgot? He was non-existent in the whole competitive scene before the Finals.

>he's not even doing that well lmao

He has been a power pick on LCK Finals, with 4 picks - 4 wins and 1 ban how the fuck is that not doing well, and if you see the games he was crucial in the wins.

Interesting enough, Urgot's presence spiked from a mix of the Asian Games and late LPL split and playoffs til now.

It was said on LPL broadcast that Urgot has been dominating scrims and such. Guess now it's starting to click even in patches where there was stronger priority beforehand (8.15 and the LCK playoffs basically).

--- 

Looking at the entire series at hand, Urgot had a 100% presence rate. So if this isn't a sign of anything to come idk what is.

The combination of Cho'gath's feast and the Urgot execute is a really disgusting comp for pro play and also Urgot doesn't have a bad matchup on top makes him even more viable and can be flexed in mid.
{{champion:83}} {{champion:83}}
I’m on my phone and it won’t let me delete ! Lol sorry
Where do you find pick & bans for lck?

http://gol.gg/champion/list/season-S8/split-ALL/tournament-ALL/patch-8.16/role-TOP/league-ALL/

you need to go into the lck section

but he only started to be pick/ban today, before today he was never picked or banned

it's as if pros got a revelation in their mind and realised urgot exists

Ranged juggernaut is just conceptually broken.

If his numbers are ever good hes ridiculously broken, like he is now.
lets not forget he has more cc and mobility than any other juggernaut as well
eh considering him more mobile than garen and voli seems odd, same goes for him having more cc than voli as well tho.

> [{quoted}](name=SociaI Justice,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O12d5gMM,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T02:14:15.942+0000)
>
> eh considering him more mobile than garen and voli seems odd, same goes for him having more cc than voli as well tho.

He get slowed and doesn't have tenacity cause no sterak yet people say he got more mobile just ignore that post that legit joke of him to say he got mobility more than anyone

Tbh, I'm more surprised that urgot didn't saw pro play sooner as the meta was more melee focus some patch ago, a meta he love the most.

As LCK are played on outdated patch, I don't even know if this trend will stay or not for world but one thing is sure, urgot was always strong into heavy melee team (need to remember that cho/sej/ali/braum/grag are all popular champ in pro atm and they all need to run toward you to do the job, giving urgot easy E>W)
the nerfs to the counters I think
